system.description: The Sister's faith is so strong that it can shield her from psychic powers and even terrify attacking psykers with its purity.
system.benefit: When using the Deny the Witch talent to make Evasion reactions against Psychic Powers, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to automatically pass the evasion test with Willpower Bonus Degrees of Success, as well as force the attacking psyker to make a Fear test against Fear 1 (+0 Fear Test).

prerequisites.text: Tier 1: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Deny the Witch

system.notes: Requires Sister of Battle Elite Advance

specialAbilities.name: Shielding Faith
specialAbilities.description: When using Deny the Witch against psychic powers, you can spend a Fate Point to automatically pass with WP Bonus Degrees of Success and force the attacking psyker to make a Fear (1) test.
